=========
item_name
=========

.. py:attribute:: item_name

**domain**: server

**language**: python

**class** :doc:`AbstractItem class </refs/server/abstractitem_api>`

Description
===========

Specifies the name of the item as referenced in code.

Use ``item_name`` to refer to the item in code.

See also
========

:doc:`Task tree </programming/task_tree>`
